title: Does the piecewise function g(x) = {-x^2-2x+3 if x<-1 and x+6 if x>=-1 have an inverse? If so, what is the approach to finding its inverse? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you tried plotting the function? That should give you a clue to the first part. If you decide it is invertible, then simply invert each segment and determine the domain of each.
